name: afb_r6_categorical
title: Afrobarometer Round 6 Trust President
description: The Afrobarometer dataset contains African's views on democracy, governance, and other issues. Round 6 surveys were collected in 36 countries
details: This is an aggregated dataset indicating count of each response option per pixel

extract_types_info.encoded: total count of each response option per unit of analysis

options.variable_description: Afb r6 response to trust president

extras.citation: BenYishay, A., Rotberg, R., Wells, J., Lv, Z., Goodman, S., Kovacevic, L., Runfola, D. 2017. Geocoding Afrobarometer Rounds 1 - 6: Methodology & Data Quality. AidData. Available online at http://geo.aiddata.org.
